modal-settings.title: Settings
modal-settings.cfg_limit_max_tips: The maximum number of files that can be processed
modal-settings.cfg_limit_warn_tips: Warn when number of files exceeds this value
modal-settings.cfg_fsn_tips: When this option is enabled, if the current step name is the default value or the same as the current runner name, the step name will be automatically updated when switching the runner
modal-settings.cfg_font_sys_tips: Use the built-in font of the program, close it and use the system font. Note: Using the system font may cause unknown UI problems, and these problems will *not* be fixed.
modal-settings.cfg_font_bold_tips: Use a bolder font to enhance readability

basecfg.msg_source_conflict: Do not select duplicate folders, subfolders or parent folders as sources!
basecfg.msg_warn_limit: You selected too many files, please wait for loading
basecfg.msg_drop_impure: Selected path contains non-folder items, automatically filtered

details.source_view_title: View all files from the source
details.result_view_title: View the status list of the current flow result
details.filter_all_title: Show the status of all source files
details.filter_flowpass_title: Show the status of files that have passed the flow check
details.filter_complete_title: Show the status of files that have passed the flow check and have output results
details.res_empty: 未通过流程或无结果输出
